line_1: I've seen thee dappl't, sleek an' glaizie,
line_2: Tho' now thou's dowie, stiff an' crazy,

line_1: I've seen thee dappl't, sleek an' glaizie,
line_2: An' thy auld hide as white's a daisie,

line_1: I've seen thee dappl't, sleek an' glaizie,
line_2: He should been tight that daur't to raize thee,
